alert.note: Alert for Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 6:00AM EST until December 19 at 3:03AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Binghamton NY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Pennsylvania... Tunkhannock Creek At Tunkhannock affecting Wyoming County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tunkhannock Creek at Tunkhannock. * WHEN...From this morning to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The Cozy Creek Family Campground becomes flooded at this stage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:44 AM EST Monday the stage was 10.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 9.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.6 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 600 PM EST.
